summary: Verified fixes for Investment Simulator currency bugs: 1) Exchange rate is now LIVE (17.17 MXN from exchangerate-api.com, not hardcoded 18.5), 2) Timeline tab now displays amounts in selected currency (MXN) instead of always showing USD.

success_rate.frontend: 100% - Currency selector works, Timeline tab shows MXN amounts correctly

context_for_next_testing_agent: Investment Simulator currency bugs are fully fixed. Live exchange rates from exchangerate-api.com are working (17.17 MXN). Timeline tab respects selectedCurrency and displays amounts in MXN when selected.

timeline_tab_currency.after: Timeline shows amounts in selected currency (MXN)
timeline_tab_currency.example: $100,000 USD investment shows as $1,717,000.00 MXN, $1,500 interest shows as $25,755.00 MXN

ui_test_results.currency_selector: SUCCESS - Shows USD/MXN/EUR options with live rates
ui_test_results.results_tab: SUCCESS - Shows amounts in MXN when selected
ui_test_results.timeline_tab: SUCCESS - Shows amounts in MXN when selected (BUG FIX VERIFIED)
